sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import {Card, CardBody} from "reactstrap"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import "./event-card.css"; const EventCard = ({event}) => { const {id, title, city, photo, price, featured, avgRating, reviews}= event return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating}{" "} ({reviews.length})
{title}
{price}/per person/
) }; export default EventCard;
